title: This Game is in Such a Sorry State Right Now
body:
What the hell is this? It's literally a race to who can 2-shot who first in a race to the bottom.  It's like flipping a coin. Once that happens, towers are literally wet paper and get mowed down by everyone now, and the team who was able to 2 shot their opponent first just annihilates baron lickity split.

Now the baron buff is absolutely insane on top of that. Minions take an eternity to kill, the team with baron is all but impossible to kill. I mean this is literally a clown fiesta right now.

Damage is so out of control. What the hell happened? Who cares ADCs aren't being played now when everyone is walking around with ADC damage demolishing everyone. What a sorry state this game is in.

I am commenting for the first time.
The current state of LoL feels exactly like the time of WOW when everyone started to leave the game (before ghostcrawler left Blizzard).
The melee warriors and assasins are mirroring DKs in WOW, they do so much more dmg than traditional AP without considering mana and cdr. 
If Riot wants to listen to the voice of players, do surveys in game (with gift) instead of only reading posts, it's like there are less than 20% players posts on the boards.

At that time in WoW the time to kill in PvP was getting shorter and shorter, as healing was so strong you needed to outburst it. 

Same with PvE, as they increased one shot boss mechanics to cope with unlimited healer mana.

It's really the same design philosophy, so I'm very much willing to blame GC now.
Everything was cool on the solution until you said ''gift'' that's a taboo word in Riot .
Do players need to be bribed to take surveys if they want the game to improve? o.O
Clearly spending money on RP hasn't improved the game either. Go figure.
